elements.name: psychosis
elements.title: Have you ever experienced symptoms of psychosis (e.g., hearing voices that other people could not hear; feeling that others could read your thoughts or that thoughts were being stolen from your mind; thinking there was a plot against you)?

elements.name: drugs
elements.title: Are you currently or have you ever abused alcohol, street drugs, or prescription drugs?

elements.name: trauma
elements.title: Have you ever experienced severe psychological trauma such as being assaulted or abused?

elements.name: trauma_interference
elements.title: If yes, does this event/trauma currently interfere with your life?
